mapper.insert: insert INTO reviews (GOODS_NUM, purchase_num, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENTS, member_id) values(#{goodsNum}, #{purchaseNum}, now() , #{reviewContents}, #{memberId})
mapper.update: update reviews set REVIEW_CONTENTS = #{reviewContents}, member_id = #{memberId}, REVIEW_DATE = now() where GOODS_NUM = #{goodsNum} and purchase_num = #{purchaseNum}
